spam-filter.name: spam-filter
spam-filter.about: A spam filter to separate fake messages from real messages.

Intelligent-Agents-Play-Rummy.name: Intelligent-Agents-Play-Rummy
Intelligent-Agents-Play-Rummy.about: Experiment for our research paper under HW0228 Scientific Communication II

Databases.name: Databases
Databases.about: A database to handle transactions for an online shopping platform. Coded in SQL server.

Video-Game-Credit-Extraction.name: Video-Game-Credit-Extraction
Video-Game-Credit-Extraction.about: A web application to extract the end credits from game credit videos. The user interface was built using ReactJS and the backend framework built using Flask along with mongoDB to store data.

Data-Analysis-with-Computer.name: Data-Analysis-with-Computer
Data-Analysis-with-Computer.about: Project aiming to analyse the expenditure trends of people based on their income as well factors such as marital status, education level etc,. This was done in order to aid the marketing strategy for a company dealing with online shopping.

JobsUpply.name: JobsUpply
JobsUpply.about: A web application to suggest jobs to students and fresh graduates based on their skills and their education field. The application also suggests courses for the users to help them learn new skills that may be required for jobs that they look for.

Course-Registration-System.name: Course-Registration-System
Course-Registration-System.about: Console based application codes in Java. The application enables students to register for their courses as well as use features such as changing class timings and adding or dropping courses.

Music-Moods.name: Music-Moods
Music-Moods.about: A music recommendation system to suggest the top 30 similar songs based on sentiment of the songs.

Canteen-information-system.name: Canteen-information-system
Canteen-information-system.about: An application to view the food menu for different stalls in NTU food canteens.
